title: Silhouette, "Portrait of Mary Chambers Jumping Rope", 1844
medium: Brush and black tempra, white chalk on gray wove paper, cut and mounted on cream colored card
inscribed:
Recto: On attached manuscript label in pen and balck ink: Mary Chambers Born 5th Dec. 34

Verso: in pen and black ink: Mary Chambers Bn 5th Decemb. 1834 New Orl. 13th April 1844.
description: A figure of a young girl is shown with a jumping rope in her upraised hands. Facing right, she is presented in mid-skip with her two long braids bouncing behind her.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Silhouette, "Portrait of Mary Chambers Jumping Rope", 1844.
1844. Brush and black tempra, white chalk on gray wove paper, cut and mounted on cream colored card. Gift of Arthur S. Vernay. 1914-42-2.
